itunes:summary:
The men accused of plotting to kidnap Michigan governor Gretchen Whitmer have been acquitted (because they were set up by the FBI), an old video of Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith shows how miserable Will is in the marriage, and Biden has extended the student loan freeze.
